821d3405-6060-4da6-a9ca-eb0700cc1ac0.name: The Lost Epoch
821d3405-6060-4da6-a9ca-eb0700cc1ac0.description: A time of advanced technology and prosperity, now shrouded in mystery. This era represents the height of technological achievement before The Collapse.

custom_fields.significance: Represents the peak of technological civilization

f14bad6f-7f53-447b-abe1-ba60afe2f637.name: Eclipse Era
f14bad6f-7f53-447b-abe1-ba60afe2f637.description: The current era, where advanced technology is perceived as magic. The truth behind the technology remains hidden from the general public. This era began with The Collapse and continues to Year 1800.

relationships.description: The Eclipse Era began with The Collapse
Eclipse Era is the current era of Astrallum

94d08020-2576-47bd-8b65-9f0149b0638f.name: Ancient Relics
94d08020-2576-47bd-8b65-9f0149b0638f.description: Highly sought after artifacts of advanced technology from The Lost Epoch. These relics are perceived as magical items but are actually remnants of the advanced civilization that existed before The Collapse.

relationships.description: Ancient Relics are remnants from The Lost Epoch
